attributes.action: Give a tax relief to all "essential services" in event of lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: all those deemed essential services (police, nhs, ambukance, fire service, supermarket delivery drivers, supermarket workers, bun men ect ect) we are all already feeling the effects of stress not being able to do a proper shop for our children or the fear of dealing with the public and catching the virus give us some relief in the way of a tax break or food parcels with essentials in allowing us to provide for our families and allowing us one less worry while we continue our jobs for the country
attributes.background: to give a tax relief or food parcels to all workers deemed essential service as a thank you and to make their lifes easier in a lockdown event scenario.
